text: Sonitu chimwasimane kwene (Ayudao) kuti niŵali ŵakupapambila nnope wumi wa duniya kwapunda ŵandu ŵane, kwapunda soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), jwalijose mwa jamanjao akasasachililaga ali apedwile wumi welewu wakwana yaka sausande, kutendaga kupedwa kwakwe wumi welewu nganikuŵa kum'bisile kwanaula ni ilagasyo. Sanotu Allah ni Jwakuilolechesya yaakutenda
